keywords.indexterm: XML Schema Diagram Editoredit schema namespaces

body.p: You can use the dialog XML Schema Namespaces to easily set a target namespace and define namespace mappings for a newly created XML Schema. In the Design mode these namespaces can be modified anytime by choosing Edit Schema Namespaces from the contextual menu. Also you can do that by double-clicking on the schema root in the diagram.
The XML Schema Namespaces dialog allows you to edit the following information:

li.p: Target namespace - The target namespace of the schema.
Prefixes - The dialog shows a table with namespaces and the mapped prefixes. You can add a new prefix mapping or remove an already existing one.
